extendedInfo.description: Avoid the awkwardness of asking for separate checks when dining with a large group of friends!  Group diners, share items, and split the check in any way you see fit!Supports up to 20 diners, 10 groups, 10 items per diner, 10 shared items.Note - this free version displays ads, but is otherwise unrestricted.  Please use and enjoy it, but if you like the app please consider supporting the development effort with your purchase of the full version.  Thanks!

reviews.comment: Perfect setup but didn\'t always calculate or split correctly..fix that and it will be wonderful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost gets it right...
reviews.comment: Just what I need but wouldn\'t show final overall bill total summary to ensure it was calc right to pay final check amount. Tip screen resets too..
reviews.author: A Google User
